comment: Yipes. Sinaed was silenced only here in America, where we couldn't accept what she did on SNL. She's still big in Ireland.
amr:

      :snt1 (y / yipes)
      :snt2 (s / silence-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Sinaed"))
            :location (h / here
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "America"))
                  :mod (o / only)
                  :location-of (p2 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                              :ARG0 (w / we)
                              :ARG1 (t / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :medium (b / broadcast-program
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "SNL")))))))
            :snt3 (b2 / big
                  :domain (s2 / she)
                  :location (c2 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Ireland"))
                  :mod (s3 / still))))
